indications:
Indications 
(From 8.3.1 Oestrogens: British National Formulary)
8.3.1 Oestrogens
name: DIETHYLSTILBESTROL
breadcrumbs: 8.3 Sex hormones and hormone antagonists in malignant disease
side-effects:
Side-effects sodium retention with oedema, thromboembolism,
jaundice, feminising effects in men; see also notes above
pregnancy:
Pregnancy in first trimester, high doses associated with vaginal
carcinoma, urogenital abnormalities, and reduced fertility in female
offspring; increased risk of hypospadias in male offspring
